aboutpara: I am a driven, detail-oriented, creative problem solver who enjoys building full-stack applications that integrate seamlessly with third party APIâ€™s, and I have a love for test-driven development and quality documentation.

resume.tagline: Detail-oriented Software Engineer with excellent communication skills

bullets: â€¢Wrote scripts using Python, JSON, and Regex to extract data from government and corporate documents
â€¢Conducted quality analysis using internal document integration tool to ensure results met requirements outlined by specifications
â€¢Collaborated across teams to provide feedback on existing tools, report bugs and identify inefficiencies
â€¢Designed new features such as ability to add multi-language relationships between documents
â€¢Updated the primary documentation for the company's web crawler engine as well as onboarding materials for new hires
â€¢Delivered to key international stakeholders with tight turnaround and efficiency

experiences.position: Junior Software Engineer at Insight Orchards
bullets: â€¢Developed a core library of reusable UI components in React using Storybook to standardize development, testing, documentation, and reduce front-end inconsistencies

â€¢Collaborated in team meetings discussing feature requirements and implementation strategies, engaging in a range of solo, pairing, and mobbing sessions to optimize development solutions and workflow
â€¢Implemented payment gateway portal that supports a multi-tier subscription model and integrates with Stripe API
â€¢Built out full-stack calendar microservice consumed by both mobile and web clients, supporting CRUD operations for single and recurring events
â€¢Developed text and audio comment features end-to-end for a community-based media application
â€¢Leveraged Test-Driven Development to implement features via unit, integration, and end-to-end tests (Cypress, Jest)
â€¢Served as a liaison between design, product, and engineers, giving weekly demos, and integrating product feedback
â€¢Participated in agile rituals such as daily stand ups, code reviews, sprint plannings, and retrospectives
â€¢Provided IT support across five departments, including product development, product assembly, admin, shipping and technology
â€¢Analyzed business operations, identified inefficiencies across departments, and developed a company-wide inventory efficiency system to reduce waste and streamline orders
â€¢Conducted staff training for new enterprise technologies
â€¢Presented data indicating increased profit margins, streamlined production, improved inventory efficiency, staff confidence and productivity
Envisioned, developed and delivered four full stack web applications in three weeks
â€¢Adapted to rapid implementation of new technologies including third party API's, frameworks, libraries and databases
â€¢Trained in software development fundamentals, object-oriented programming, test driven development, Git/Github version control
â€¢Honed technical communications, delivered presentations highlighting project implementations details and business objectives
